entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
